ygData.subject: Rune I and magic armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Just so I understand, Rune I does consume a stone each time you cast it, right?  I should carry a supply of these stones around? Is there any reason to prefer
ygData.messageBody:
Just so I understand, Rune I does consume a stone each time you cast
it, right? I should carry a supply of these stones around?

Is there any reason to prefer netted over cloth? same ac but it is
magic. Does magic armor make any difference to getting hit?


thanks

--- osmosis <osmosis@...> wrote:
> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
> 1. Rune I is a great spell, its a lot like divine
> aura (cleric). More or
> less it grants invunerability for a short time which
> I'm sure you can
> imagine is quite handy. A good spell to have!
